text: Kamen Rider Drive is a Japanese tokusatsu television series, Kamen Rider franchise. ==Schedule== Super Hero Time Ressha Sentai ToQger and then Shuriken Sentai Ninninger. ==Cast== * Shinnosuke Tomari / Kamen Rider Drive: Ryoma Takeuchi * Kiriko Shijima: Rio Uchida * Go Shijima / Kamen Rider Mach: Yu Inaba * Chase / Mashin Chaser / Kamen Rider Chaser, Koichi Kano (47): Taiko Katono * Heart, Business Man (40): Tomoya Warabino * Brain, Mitsuharu Kineta (43): Shota Matsushima * Medic, Misuzu Hatori (41, 42): Fumika Baba * Akira Hayase: Yukihiro Takiguchi * Harley Hendrickson: Ulf Ōtsuki * Eisuke Tomari: Tareyanagi * Rinna Sawagami: Rei Yoshii * Kyu Saijo, Roidmude 072: Kenta Hamano * Genpachiro Otta: Taira Imata * Krim Steinbelt, Mr. Belt, Roidmude 004, Drive Driver Equipment Voice, Narration: Chris Peppler * Mitsuhide Nira: Kisuke Iida * Soichi Makage: Masashi Horiuchi * Tenjuro Banno, Sigma Circular (Voice; 46, 47): Masakazu Morita * Jun Honganji / Kamen Rider Jun: Tsurutaro Kataoka ===Guest cast=== * Niina Kisaragi (2, 13, 14): Hitomi Isaka (Kamen Rider Girls) * Satsuki Yamabuki (2, 13, 14): Mitsuki Endo (Kamen Rider Girls) * Yuzo Ichikawa (5, 6): Kohei Yamamoto * Gunman (12, 13): Bernard Ackah * Rira Nanao (14, 15): Haruka Suenaga * Hiroki Nikaido (15): Masashi Mikami * Takuro Mogi (23, 24): Naoki Takeshi * Kamen Rider Ghost (Voice; 47, 48): Shun Nishime * Yurusen (Voice; 47, 48): Aoi Yūki * Keisuke Okamura (48): Hassei Takano ===Movie War Full Throttle cast=== * Zoruku Tojo / Kamen Rider Lupin, Cyberoid ZZZ (Voice): Yūji Ayabe * Megahex (Voice) / ZZZ Megahex (Voice), Genesis Drive Equipment Voice: Shin-ichiro Miki ===Super Hero Taisen GP cast=== * Kyoichiro Kuroi / Kamen Rider 3: Mitsuhiro Oikawa * General Black: Nobuhiro Takada * Mitsuru: Masahiro Ezaki * Naoki: Mitsumasa Sato * Shigeru: Daikichi Sano ===Surprise Future cast=== * Eiji Tomari / Kamen Rider Dark Drive: Mackenyu * Miku Hanasaki: Miwako Kakei * Miku's manager: Taihei Katō (of TV Asahi announcer) * Shinji Koba: Shingo Yanagisawa ===Driver Saga cast=== ;Kamen Rider Mach/Kamen Rider Heart * Heart / Kamen Rider Heart: Tomoya Warabino ;Kamen Rider Brain * Brain / Kamen Rider Brain: Shota Matsushima ==Theme Song== ; Opening theme * "SURPRISE-DRIVE" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: tatsuo (of everset) ** Artist: Mitsuru Matsuoka EARNEST DRIVE ; Insert themes * "Full Throttle" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: tatsuo (of everset) ** Artist: S.S.P.D. ~Steel Sound Police Dept~ ** Episodes: 13, 14, 16, 17, 19, 24, 46 * "Don't lose your mind" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: tatsuo (of everset) ** Artist: S.S.P.D. ~Steel Sound Police Dept~ ** Episodes: 15, 16, 18, 30 * "UNLIMITED DRIVE" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: DJ Hurrykenn ** Arrangement: Ryo (of difspiral) ** Artist: Kamen Rider Girls ** Episodes: 33, 34 * "Spinning Wheel" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Shinnosuke Tomari, Go Shijima, & Chase (Ryoma Takeuchi, Yu Inaba, & Taiko Katono) ** Episodes: 36, 38, 40, 45 * "sing my song for you ~Sayanora no Mukōgawa made~" (subtitle "Farewell From the Other Side") ** Lyrics: Mitsuru Matsuoka ** Composition: Mitsuru Matsuoka, tatsuo (of everset) ** Artist: Mitsuru Matsuoka EARNEST DRIVE with TEAM Drive and Gaim (Gaku Sano, Yutaka Kobayashi, Yuumi Shida, Ryoma Takeuchi, Rio Uchida, Taiko Katono, Tomoya Warabino, and Shota Matsushima) * "Who's That Guy" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: SAKOSHIN ** Artist: Mitsuhiro Oikawa * "re-ray" ** Lyrics & Composition: Mitsuru Matsuoka ** Arrangement: tatsuo (of everset), Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Mitsuru Matsuoka EARNEST DRIVE * "good bye little moon" ** Performed by: Mitsuru Matsuoka EARNEST DRIVE Category:Japanese science fiction television series Category:2014 Japanese television series debuts Category:2015 Japanese television series endings
title: Kamen Rider Drive
